title: Macbook pro (retina) : experiencing FPS unstable problem after patch 7.1
body:
I have been playing league of legend for 3 years and It worked well before I patch this new updates today.
It started to have unstable FPS and the screen is stopping in every few seconds.
I have adjusted the in-game-setting and still not working.
also I have tried SMC setting and still not working.

replies.body:
Do you have the enlarge mouse pointer thing enabled? That was my problem and caused similar issues. Try this:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/O8wLX4Ag-urgent-game-freezes-every-couple-seconds-with-the-new-macbook-pro-in-full-screen?comment=0015

There could be a few different reasons your FPS is fluctuating around. Most of the time we see these issues happen if there's something wrong with a system setting or there are some hardware issues going on with your computer. Our [**Framerate Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#section-mac) will walk you through the steps that I recommend taking in order to narrow down the culprit and potentially solving this. 

Let me know if this resolved the issue for you.

Game freezes every couple seconds with the new Macbook Pro in full screen.
window mode is fine
